CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self Service for bulk uploads
CurrentVersion.description: Improved self-service; Ability to bulk upload customer permissions for improved access.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self Service for bulk uploads
OldVersion.description: Improved self-service; Ability to bulk upload customer permissions for improved access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Collaborative notes in Teams meeting recordings
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables users to view and edit collaborative meeting notes while watching Teams meeting recordings in Stream. Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned tasks in collaborative meeting notes automatically sync with To Do & Planner.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Collaborative notes in Teams meeting recordings
OldVersion.description: This feature enables users to view and edit collaborative meeting notes while watching Teams meeting recordings in Stream. Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned tasks in collaborative meeting notes automatically sync with To Do & Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Clicking the To Do icon in the navigation bar will open inline and will no longer open in a separate browser window.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Clicking the To Do icon in the navigation bar will open inline and will no longer open in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Glint
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Highlight top issues and potential solutions hidden throughout employee suggestions from survey results; plus, help leaders explore comments using natural-language questions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Glint Copilot
OldVersion.description:
,
Highlight top issues and potential solutions hidden throughout employee suggestions from survey results; plus, help leaders explore comments using natural-language questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement link shown to attendees joining a Teams Meeting. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Meetings
OldVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement link shown to attendees joining a Teams Meeting. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business available in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in classic Outlook for Windows, for a consistent and fast experience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business available in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: ,Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in classic Outlook for Windows, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Answers Intelligent Importer
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to upload documents and use AI to generate question and answer pairs from that content within Answers and communities on Engage for premium users. Answers Intelligent Importer aims to transform static to dynamic, fostering active engagement and interactive conversations. This approach also facilitates the easy retrieval and reuse of generated answers, preventing them from getting lost within the depths of a document.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Answers Intelligent Importer
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to upload documents and use AI to generate question and answer pairs from that content within Answers and communities on Engage for premium users. Answers Intelligent Importer aims to transform static to dynamic, fostering active engagement and interactive conversations. This approach also facilitates the easy retrieval and reuse of generated answers, preventing them from getting lost within the depths of a document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -Update UI/UX admin experience
CurrentVersion.description: Update UI/UX admin experience for advanced configuration settings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -Update UI/UX admin experience
OldVersion.description: Update UI/UX admin experience for advanced configuration settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
CurrentVersion.description: You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
OldVersion.description: You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Transfer Teams calls to mobile calls
CurrentVersion.description: When using Teams on mobile phones, users can now transfer their ongoing Teams calls to the phone's native dialer, without any disruption or loss of context.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Transfer Teams calls to mobile calls
OldVersion.description: When using Teams on mobile phones, users can now transfer their ongoing Teams calls to the phone's native dialer, without any disruption or loss of context.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage navigation model enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Updates on Viva Engage navigation model to bring consistency across web and Teams and Outlook integrations and simplify finding everything Viva Engage has to offer.

OldVersion.title: Yammer: Viva Engage navigation model enhancements
OldVersion.description: Updates on Viva Engage navigation model to bring consistency across web and Teams and Outlook integrations and simplify finding everything Viva Engage has to offer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Sidebar Tools App - SpeedTest
CurrentVersion.description:
This adds a SpeedTest answer by default to the Tools app in the Edge sidebar.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-sidebar

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Prioritize analysis of policy-driven alerts with Azure Cognitive Services (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description:
Leveraging Azure Cognitive Services, messages already matching policy conditions will be categorized in “positive,” “negative,” or “neutral” sentiment, giving policy investigators more context to prioritize potentially riskier messages to address first. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
